description: The lily of the Nile (Agapanthus 'Summer Skies') is the perfect addition to any garden. Featuring beautiful deep sky-blue bell-shaped blooms, this bold perennial flower blooms reliably throughout the summer, often re-blooming again later in the season. The vibrant blooms rise above sturdy, green foliage, and look great planted in a garden, in containers, or even in a vase as a cut flower. For an even more stunning display, this variety can be combined with others to create a mass of color. Its hardiness and pest-resistance make it a great choice for novice and experienced gardeners alike.
